tasks.task: Explain the challenges faced by small and marginal farmers in India and potential solutions.
subtasks: Discuss the prevalence of small and marginal landholders among Indian farmers.
Highlight the importance of extension services and real-time information for farmers.
Emphasize the significance of supply chain management and post-harvest support for farmers.
Address the need for technology innovation and water conservation techniques.
Mention the success of partnerships in educating farmers through field demonstrations.
Describe the process of soil testing and personalized package of practices for farmers.
Highlight the impact of the integrated solution on farmer productivity.
Discuss the challenge of youth interest in agriculture in India.
Advocate for youth awareness and involvement in agriculture.
